TITLE: RecEvalTool
WELCOME_TEXT: We would like to invite you to take part in our user study. This study is done to improve the recommender system developed by us. If you are not signed up already then do so right now and help with the development of a recommender system.
ABSTRACT: is an open source solution for user-centric evaluation of recommender systems.
NO_TRACK_PROFILE: Your profile does not contain any tracks
NO_AUDIO_TAG_SUPPORT: Your browser does not support the audio element.
NO_PREVIEW_AVAILABLE: Sorry. Audio preview is not available for this track.
PROFILE_ENOUGH_SONGS: Your profile contains enough tracks. You can add further tracks or you can change the view to
PROFILE_ADD_FURTHER_SONGS_1: You should add further tracks to get better fitting recommendations before you change the view to
PROFILE_NOT_ENOUGH_SONGS_1: You need to like/dislike tracks until you've found
PROFILE_NOT_ENOUGH_SONGS_2: tracks you like to complete your profile.
PASSWORD_RESET_ASK: Ask for a new password reset
